title: Pasticceria Jerry
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pastry shop selling also savory dishes. Vegan include: traditional Sicilian arancini (rice balls filled with soy meat and peas), and many sweets (Sicilian cannoli to be filled with vegan zabaione, custard cream or chocolate cream and vegan whipped cream; vegan petits-fours; vegan panettone and pandoro at Christmas). Takes special orders for vegan cakes.
